CustomField.description: This shows the status of the OrderItem's booking. Not Bookable means this orderItem isn't a bookable product. To be booked means this orderItem is bookable but hasn't yet been booked. Reschedule Allowed means this orderItem is bookable and has been booked but can be rescheduled. Reschedule Not Allowed means this orderItem is bookable but can't be rescheduled.
CustomField.formula: IF(Product2.s_c__Booking_Duration__c >0 , IF(ISBLANK(Booked_Class__c), 'To be booked', IF(ISPICKVAL(Booked_Class__r.s_c__Status__c , 'Booked') && Booked_Class__r.Start_Date__c > Today(), 'Reschedule Allowed', 'Reschedule Not Allowed')) , 'Not Bookable')
CustomField.label: Bookable Status
